description:
Looking for a new antenna rotator?

You’ve come to the right place! We have everything you need to get your TV reception back up and running. From antennas to amplifiers, we have it all. And if you don't find what you're looking for on our site, just give us a call and one of our experts will be happy to help! The Channel Master CM-9521HD Rotator System is a remote-controlled antenna system that allows you to position your TV antenna from a distance. This product has been designed for those who are looking to install an outdoor TV antenna and want the ability to control its positioning remotely. It includes an electronic control box, which can be mounted up to a 2" in diameter mast, and a control unit with built-in telescoping whip antennas. With this product, you'll never have to worry about climbing on ladders or roofs again! You'll also save time by not having to make multiple trips back and forth between the roof and ground level just so you can change your antenna's direction. Simply use the remote controller instead! And if you're worried about safety, don't be - it's UL listed for indoor/outdoor use.
name: Antenna Rotators
